ping.description: Check if the bot is alive

collector.end: Thank you for setting up Lifeguard

setup.description: Sets up guild for use with Lifeguard

warn.description: Appends a warning to the specified user

errors.noUser: The specified user has not been found

inf.desc: You have received a warning in {guild} for `{reason}`
inf.title: Warning

random.description: Flips a coin and selects a random number from given range.

errors.argsNAN: One of the given arguments is not a number.

remind.body: Okay, I will remind you at `{timestamp}` about `{text}`
remind.reminder: :alarm_clock: You asked me to remind you at `{timestamp}` about `{text}`
